content.json:
# Azure Arc â€“ Agent Version Compliance

> âš ï¸ **Microsoft support policy ([Agent Release Notes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/agent-release-notes)):**  
> *Only Connected Machine agent versions released within the last year are officially supported by the product group. All customers should update to an agent version within this window or [enable automatic agent upgrades](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/manage-agent#automatic-agent-upgrade-preview). Microsoft recommends staying up to date with the latest agent version whenever possible.*

**Latest known version:** 1.61 (February 2026) Â· **Last updated:** 2026-02-27

## ðŸ”„ Change Log |Version|Date|Description| |---|---|---| |v1.6| 2026-02-27 | - **UpgradeStatus column** added to Auto Upgrade table: detects Pending / Pending (Offline) / Completed via `desiredVersion` comparison
- Tile order changed: Supported â†’ Out of Support â†’ Auto Upgrade â†’ Connected â†’ Total (Total moved to right)| |v1.5| 2026-02-27 | - Parameter filtering applied to ALL 13 queries
- Consistent 4-category support status everywhere
- Empty version â†’ "Unknown" instead of "."
- `OSType` replaced with `OSVersion`; `OS` enriched with `osSku`
- `AwaitingConnection` added to Connection Status filter
- `SupportStatus` column added to Auto Upgrade detail table| |v1.4| 2026-02-27 | - Tile KPIs replacing flat KPI table
- Server inventory title â†’ "Arc Server Details - Support Status"
- Sort: Out of Support first; Changelog to beginning (hidden)| |v1.3| 2026-02-27 | - English localization; parameters `*` â†’ `All`| |v1.2| 2026-02-27 | - Parser fix: `todatetime()` replacing `datetime()` for Resource Graph; removed `let` statements| |v1.1| 2026-02-27 | - 3 pie charts, 2 bar charts, subscription names, colour-coded formatters, export to Excel| |v1.0| 2026-02-27 | - Initial release: KPI, server inventory, auto upgrade, version reference, 24 mapped versions|

### Change Log

| Version | Date | Description | Author |
| ------- | ----- | ----------- | ------ |
| v1.0.0 | Novembro 2024 | - CriaÃ§Ã£o inicial do Workbook em **11/11/2024**. </br> - Info adicional. | Fabio Rodrigues Vieira Costa - CSA Azure Infra |

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion), status = tostring(properties.status), autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
| extend autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1]))
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| summarize Value = countif(supportStatus == "Latest version"), Total = count()
| extend Pct = iff(Total > 0, round(100.0 * Value / Total, 1), 0.0)
| extend Subtitle = strcat(Pct, "% of ", Total, " servers")
content.title: Latest Version

| extend Subtitle = strcat(Pct, "% of ", Total, " servers")

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"

| extend agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1]))
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion), status = tostring(properties.status), autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
| extend autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1]))
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| summarize Servers = count() by Version = agentMajorMinor, SupportStatus = supportStatus
| order by Version asc
content.title: Servers by Agent Version

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion), status = tostring(properties.status), autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
| extend autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1]))
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| summarize Servers = count() by SupportStatus = supportStatus, AutoUpgrade = autoUpgradeLabel
| extend sortPriority = case(SupportStatus == "Out of support", 1, SupportStatus == "Unknown", 2, SupportStatus == "Supported", 3, SupportStatus == "Latest version", 4, 5)
| order by sortPriority asc
| project-away sortPriority
content.title: Support Status vs Auto Upgrade

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| join kind=leftouter (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type =~ "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
    | project subscriptionId, SubscriptionName = name
) on subscriptionId
| extend
    agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion),
    status = tostring(properties.status),
    osName = tostring(properties.osName),
    osSku = tostring(properties.osSku),
    osVersion = tostring(properties.osVersion),
    lastStatusChange = todatetime(properties.lastStatusChange),
    machineFqdn = tostring(properties.machineFqdn),
    autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade),
    desiredVersion = tostring(properties.agentUpgrade.desiredVersion)
| extend
    agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1])),
    autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend releaseLabel = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Feb 2026", agentMajorMinor == "1.60", "Jan 2026", agentMajorMinor == "1.59", "Dec 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.58", "Nov 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.57", "Oct 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.56", "Sep 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.55", "Aug 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.54", "Jul 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.53", "Jun 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.52", "May 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.51", "Apr 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.50", "Mar 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.49", "Feb 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.48", "Jan 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.47", "Oct 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.46", "Sep 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.45", "Aug 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.44", "Jul 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.43", "Jun 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.42", "May 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.41", "May 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.40", "Apr 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.39", "Mar 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.38", "Feb 2024", "Unknown")
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| project
    Server = name,
    Subscription = SubscriptionName,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Location = location,
    AgentVersion = agentVersion,
    Release = releaseLabel,
    SupportStatus = supportStatus,
    ConnectionStatus = status,
    AutoUpgrade = autoUpgradeLabel,
    DesiredVersion = iff(isempty(desiredVersion), "-", desiredVersion),
    OS = iff(isnotempty(osSku), osSku, iff(isnotempty(osName), osName, "-")),
    OSVersion = iff(isnotempty(osVersion), osVersion, "-"),
    LastUpdate = lastStatusChange,
    FQDN = coalesce(machineFqdn, "-")
| extend sortPriority = case(SupportStatus == "Out of support", 1, SupportStatus == "Unknown", 2, SupportStatus == "Supported", 3, SupportStatus == "Latest version", 4, 5)
| order by sortPriority asc, AgentVersion asc, Server asc
| project-away sortPriority
content.title: Arc Server Details - Support Status

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| join kind=leftouter (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type =~ "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
    | project subscriptionId, SubscriptionName = name
) on subscriptionId
| extend
    agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion),
    status = tostring(properties.status),
    autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade),
    desiredVersion = tostring(properties.agentUpgrade.desiredVersion),
    lastAttemptTimestamp = tostring(properties.agentUpgrade.lastAttemptTimestamp),
    lastAttemptStatus = tostring(properties.agentUpgrade.lastAttemptStatus),
    lastAttemptMessage = tostring(properties.agentUpgrade.lastAttemptMessage)
| extend
    agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1])),
    autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| extend desiredMM = iff(isnotempty(desiredVersion), strcat(split(desiredVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(desiredVersion, ".")[1]), "")
| extend upgradeStatus = case(isnotempty(desiredVersion) and agentMajorMinor != desiredMM and status != "Connected", "Pending (Offline)", isnotempty(desiredVersion) and agentMajorMinor != desiredMM, "Pending", isnotempty(desiredVersion) and agentMajorMinor == desiredMM, "Completed", "-")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| project
    Server = name,
    Subscription = SubscriptionName,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    AgentVersion = agentVersion,
    SupportStatus = supportStatus,
    DesiredVersion = iff(isempty(desiredVersion), "-", desiredVersion),
    UpgradeStatus = upgradeStatus,
    AutoUpgrade = autoUpgradeLabel,
    ConnectionStatus = status,
    LastStatus = iff(isempty(lastAttemptStatus), "-", lastAttemptStatus),
    LastAttempt = iff(isempty(lastAttemptTimestamp), "-", lastAttemptTimestamp),
    Message = iff(isempty(lastAttemptMessage), "-", lastAttemptMessage)
| extend sortPriority = case(UpgradeStatus == "Pending (Offline)", 1, UpgradeStatus == "Pending", 2, UpgradeStatus == "Completed", 3, 4)
| order by sortPriority asc, AutoUpgrade asc, Server asc
| project-away sortPriority
content.title: Auto Upgrade â€“ Server Details

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend agentVersion = tostring(properties.agentVersion), status = tostring(properties.status), autoUpgradeEnabled = tobool(properties.agentUpgrade.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
| extend autoUpgradeLabel = case(autoUpgradeEnabled == true, "Enabled", autoUpgradeEnabled == false, "Disabled", "N/A")
| extend agentMajorMinor = iff(isempty(agentVersion), "Unknown", strcat(split(agentVersion, ".")[0], ".", split(agentVersion, ".")[1]))
| extend releaseDate = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", todatetime('2026-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.60", todatetime('2026-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.59", todatetime('2025-12-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.58", todatetime('2025-11-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.57", todatetime('2025-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.56", todatetime('2025-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.55", todatetime('2025-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.54", todatetime('2025-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.53", todatetime('2025-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.52", todatetime('2025-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.51", todatetime('2025-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.50", todatetime('2025-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.49", todatetime('2025-02-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.48", todatetime('2025-01-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.47", todatetime('2024-10-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.46", todatetime('2024-09-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.45", todatetime('2024-08-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.44", todatetime('2024-07-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.43", todatetime('2024-06-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.42", todatetime('2024-05-15'), agentMajorMinor == "1.41", todatetime('2024-05-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.40", todatetime('2024-04-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.39", todatetime('2024-03-01'), agentMajorMinor == "1.38", todatetime('2024-02-01'), todatetime('1900-01-01'))
| extend supportStatus = case(releaseDate >= ago(365d) and agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Latest version", releaseDate >= ago(365d), "Supported", releaseDate == todatetime('1900-01-01'), "Unknown", "Out of support")
| where supportStatus in ({SupportFilter}) or 'All' in ({SupportFilter})
| where status in ({StatusFilter}) or 'All' in ({StatusFilter})
| where autoUpgradeLabel in ({AutoUpgradeFilter}) or 'All' in ({AutoUpgradeFilter})
| extend releaseLabel = case(agentMajorMinor == "1.61", "Feb 2026", agentMajorMinor == "1.60", "Jan 2026", agentMajorMinor == "1.59", "Dec 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.58", "Nov 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.57", "Oct 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.56", "Sep 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.55", "Aug 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.54", "Jul 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.53", "Jun 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.52", "May 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.51", "Apr 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.50", "Mar 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.49", "Feb 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.48", "Jan 2025", agentMajorMinor == "1.47", "Oct 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.46", "Sep 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.45", "Aug 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.44", "Jul 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.43", "Jun 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.42", "May 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.41", "May 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.40", "Apr 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.39", "Mar 2024", agentMajorMinor == "1.38", "Feb 2024", "Unknown")
| summarize Servers = count() by agentMajorMinor, releaseDate, releaseLabel, supportStatus
| extend EndOfSupport = iff(supportStatus == "Unknown", "-", tostring(datetime_add('day', 365, releaseDate)))
| extend DaysRemaining = iff(supportStatus == "Unknown", "-", tostring(iff(releaseDate >= ago(365d), datetime_diff('day', datetime_add('day', 365, releaseDate), now()), toint(0))))
| project Version = agentMajorMinor, Release = releaseLabel, SupportStatus = supportStatus, EndOfSupport, DaysRemaining, Servers, releaseDate
| order by releaseDate desc
| project-away releaseDate
content.title: Versions Found in Your Environment

content.json:
---
### Notes & Links

| Item | Detail |
|------|--------|
| **Support policy** | [Agent Release Notes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/agent-release-notes) â€” versions released more than 365 days ago lose official support |
| **Agent overview** | [Connected Machine agent overview](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/agent-overview) |
| **Enable Auto Upgrade** | [Automatic agent upgrade](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/manage-agent#automatic-agent-upgrade-preview) |
| **Enable Auto Upgrade (CLI)** | `az connectedmachine upgrade-extension --machine-name <name> -g <rg>` |
| **Resource Graph Explorer** | [Open in Portal](https://portal.azure.com/#view/HubsExtension/ArgQueryBlade) â€“ click **â‹¯** on any panel â†’ *Open query in Resource Graph Explorer* |
| **Mapped versions** | 1.38 (Feb 2024) through 1.61 (Feb 2026) â€” older versions show as "Unknown" |
| **âš™ï¸ Maintenance** | When a new agent version is released, add it to the `case()` blocks in each query and update `1.61` (latestVersion) |
